content: this pattern is a two-in-one an axolotl that can be easily turned into a reversible axolotl for this pattern you can use any yarn weight and hook size though what i used in this pattern was a 10ply/aran weight yarn and a 4 5mm hook the pattern and tutorial is available here https //youtu be/5oetz9b5yog pattern details hook size correct size for yarn yarn any weight terms us difficulty beginner finished size depends on yarn/hook size materials & supplies to make this pattern you will need yarn scissors needle stitch markers pins stuffing optional safety eyes
